data.text: @DJRich1906 @AddiktedtoQuack Fo sho, its sunny BUT cold😔
@TheRealRachelin @AddiktedtoQuack Good morning Rach! Man, the weather in the D always be playing with folks emotions...
@DJRich1906 @AddiktedtoQuack Good morning peps, how is everyone doing this sunny🌞 morning...D, it got down to 56° last night SMH...I don't know what I'm going to fo eith this weather up here

@AddiktedtoQuack @TheRealRachelin True, but the situations would be a bit different. Stevens, young college coach came into a situation with young, recent college players. Expectations were lower and he could “grow” w/the team. Pistons situation is in disarray, yet higher expectations. Not ideal for JB.

@TheRealRachelin @PizzaMcrib It would take a miracle from God for LBJ to carry this dead weight. When your bench refuses to play with any level of consistency, and you gift wrap game #1, these are the results. Mentally how do you come back? It’s gonna be tough.

@TheRealRachelin Whatupdoe Rach! Thanks Sis, and shouts to your hubby! I was on droppin a dime or two. But yeah, I wouldn’t be mad at Coach B(but hope he stays at UM). I still like Casey as my #1 choice because he’s a defensive minded coach who knows offense. Beilein is offensive, w/no NBA exp.

@PizzaMcrib @DJRich1906 LBJ's team is weak AF rt now JR Smith has NEVER shown up when a team needs him, Kolver is a no show. 3 point shooter, Hood needs his ass whooped, Lance be looking lost when he's on the court, and G. Hill has ALWAYS been a BUM to me...Ty Lou is a fault also
